ServiceWorkerRegistrationUpdateViaCache.summary: The updateViaCache read-only property of the interface returns the value of the setting used to determine the circumstances in which the browser will consult the HTTP cache when it tries to update the service worker or any scripts that are imported via .

-Using Service Workers
-Service workers basic code example
-Using web workers
